name: wed-am
description: 1. Start with slides 1. Discuss nested callbacks (aka callback hell), use ascii art as an example 1. Switch to slides and introduce Promises 1. Refactor the ascii art example by using fs.Promises 1. Handling failure by using `.catch` 1. Build a web app using express and Promises 1. Encourage students to look at the **Promises** folder 1. Back to slides (Takeaways)
